baseURL.description: Overwrites the base url that platform actions call

config.description: Main configuration object the generator and buildable uses to identify and configure the actions

platform.description: Name of the third party platform (i.e github)

type.description: Buildable's type identifier for the type of action

envVars.description: Specifies environment variables used in the actions

development.description: Specifies the default value for the development environment

production.description: Specifies the default value for the production environment

in.description: Specifies where the environment variable is used in the API request

name.description: Specifies the key name of the environment variable
